page.title: 20COMMUNICATIONS..BUS SERVICES
page.content: Virtually everyone living in our study area their own means of the transport to get to and from work and travel to neighbouring towns for shopping and services. No place is more than 10 min travelling time from Cupar. Alexanders operate 2 service routes in our area but as the figures show the frequency is a bit patchy, especially at weekends. For instance on the Cupar to Auchtermuchty road, the main link to the Forth Road Bridge, there are 12 buses each week day,8 on Saturday and 4 on Sunday. On the Cupar to Newburgh route, the main road to Perth and beyond, there are only 6 buses each weekday,5 on Saturday and none on Sunday. As you can see it is as well local people have their own independent means of transport.
